text: Gurdeep Pandher is a Sikh-Canadian, Yukon-based author, teacher and performer, who makes Punjabi dance videos. Gurdeep was born into a farming family, in a small village in Siahar, Punjab. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Punjabi people Category:Canadian YouTubers
title: Gurdeep Pandher
